page.title: 09Information Systems
page.content:
Pindar Group is an expanding family business with 150 years experience. It consists of Pindar Print, which is outside this D-Block, and Filmtype and Pindar Set, both employing around 70 people. Filmtype uses the Ferranti interactive system, while Pindar Set uses a fully computerized production cycle. The three parts of the group are independent, but form a single cohesive organization which produces books, magazines and directories.
{ Scalby}Library was built in 1965 and has a floor area of 3,100 square feet. It contains around 7,500 books, including children's and reference books. The library provides facilities for lectures, study circles and exhibitions, plus information on local history. Photocopying services are also available.
